item.title: Docker 运行 rstudio
item.author: william
item.description: 参考链接：https://github.com/rocker-org/rocker/issues/206 https://hub.docker.com/r/rocker/rstudio 1 2 3 4 ## 新建 Docker docker run -d --name rstudio -v $HOME:/home/`whoami` -e USER=lfang

item.title: Rstudio server with ldap
item.author: william
item.description: 1 2 3 4 5 wget https://download2.rstudio.org/server/centos7/x86_64/rstudio-server-rhel-1.4.1717-x86_64.rpm yum install rstudio-server-rhel-1.4.1717-x86_64.rpm sudo rstudio-server restart sudo cp /etc/pam.d/login /etc/pam.d/rstudio

item.title: Rstudio server with ldap
item.author: william
item.description:
To install Rstudio in CentOS system, we need to run following commands:

1
2
3
4
5

wget https://download2.rstudio.org/server/centos7/x86_64/rstudio-server-rhel-1.4.1717-x86_64.rpm
yum install rstudio-server-rhel-1.4.1717-x86_64.rpm
sudo rstudio-server restart

sudo cp /etc/pam.d/login /etc/pam.d/rstudio

item.title: RShiny 使用指南
item.author: william
item.description: RShiny 是什么Shiny 是一个 R 语言的软件包，提供了用于制作 Web-UI/app 的便捷工具。这些应用提供了交互式的数据展示、实时的统计分析与高度可定制化的操作界面，

item.author: william
